name: drawer-organizer
description: A custom drawer organizer design application

scripts.check-ports: echo 'Client Port 5173:' && (lsof -i :5173 || echo 'Available') && echo 'Server Port 3000:' && (lsof -i :3000 || echo 'Available')
scripts.kill-ports: echo 'Killing processes on ports 5173 and 3000...' && (lsof -ti :5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process on 5173') && (lsof -ti :3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process on 3000')
scripts.setup-ports: npm run kill-ports && sleep 2 && npm run check-ports
